mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (rno, pno, rcontent) values(seq_review_rno.nextval, #{pno}, #{rcontent})
mapper.select: select rcontent, rdate, ruuid, rsavedir, rfname, rftype from tbl_review where pno=#{pno}
mapper.update: update tbl_review set rcontent=#{rcontent} where rno=#{rno}
update tbl_review set ruuid = #{ruuid}, rsavedir = #{rsavedir}, rfname = #{rfname}, rftype = #{rftype} where rno = #{rno}
